article_title: How Obamacare Is Ruining Health Insurance

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: The health insurance market is changing. And the changes are not good. Even before there was Obamacare, most insurers most of the time had perverse incentives to attract the healthy and avoid the sick. But now that the Affordable Care Act has completely changed the nature of the market, the [...]
